verbose_text: In the absence of only p53, four cell survival pathways were still active, i.e. activation of anti-apoptotic NF-kappaB, cell cycle arrest induced by c-Myc downregulation, Cyclin dependent kinase 2 (Cdk2) inhibition, and phosphorylation of Cdc25C.
evidence: induced by c-Myc downregulation, Cyclin-dependent kinase 2 (Cdk2) inhibition, and phosphorylation of Cdc25C
